title: Eixample White - Watch Face
summary: Turn your Android Wear into a first class luxury looking watch (square & round)

This is the extraction of one of the most intense urban places in Europe.Tags: smartwatch, Face, wear, androidwear, watchface, watch face, smartwatchface, watch, white, luxury, elegantCompatible watches: LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola 360  (Moto 360).
descriptionHTML:
Let your watchface look like a real watch

Omitsis presents the most carefully designed watch face for Android Wear. ‘Eixample’ is the beginning of a series of watch faces created by T. Hugo, a professional watch designer based in Berlin, Germany.

Eixample [əˈʃampɫə]:
Inspired by this stunning quarter of Barcelona with its wide avenues, its famous grid of apartment blocks and its cosmopolitan way of life.
This is the extraction of one of the most intense urban places in Europe.

Tags: smartwatch, Face, wear, androidwear, watchface, watch face, smartwatchface, watch, white, luxury, elegant

Compatible watches: LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola 360 (Moto 360).
comments: Finally a watch face that's Moto 360 friendly! I love how this face is Moto 360 friendly. It adjusts the face to account for the "flat tire" ambient sensors.
Looks like the real thing. Love it.
amazing luxury like watch!  please do more! I love the Eixample series.  Thank you Omitsis!
recentChanges: Watch face has been migrated to the new Android Wear Lollipop update
